sense.gloss: to receive, to get, to accept, to take, to buy
to be crowned with, to wear (on one's head), to have (on top)
to have (as one's leader), to live under (a ruler), to install (a president)
to get someone to do something

sdata.j: ↑以下↑↓いか↓の↑空欄↑↓くうらん↓↑部分↑↓ぶぶん↓にご↑記入|↑↓きにゅう↓↑頂↑↓いただ↓く|だけで↑結構↑↓けっこう↓です。
sdata.e: All you have to do is fill in the blanks below.

sdata.j: この↑件↑↓けん↓についてさらに↑話↑↓はな↓し↑合↑↓あ↓うためにお↑越↑↓こ↓し|↑頂↑↓いただ↓く|↑日時↑↓にちじ↓を↑決↑↓き↓めて↑下↑↓くだ↓さい。
sdata.e: Please make an appointment to come in and discuss this further.
